registry.title: Standards-related organizations that have registered Media Types in the Standards Tree
registry.category: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) and Media Types

registry.title: Standards-related organizations that have registered Media Types in the Standards Tree
registry.note: The following standards-related organizations have registered Media Types in the Standards Tree on or after 21 June 2012. IANA will process future requests from these organizations without further consultation with the IESG. Requests from other organizations will be confirmed by the IESG, and after such confirmation those organizations will be added to this list. In any case, all Media Type registrations in the Standards Tree go through normal Expert Review.

record.org: American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers (ASHRAE)
Association for Standardisation of Automation and Measuring Systems (ASAM)
IEEE Industry Standards and Technology Organization
Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE)
